extends Entity
    Represents an Obstacle.
    Author:
    Benji Garment, Joe Wrieden

    • Constructor Detail

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle(ObstacleType type,
                float startX,
                int width)
        Creates a new Obstacle of a specific type and bounds in which it can be created.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of obstacle.
        startX - The starting x value the obstacle can be created in.
        width - How far from startX the obstacle can be created.

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle(ObstacleType type,
                com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos)
        Creates a new Obstacle of a specific type and bounds in which it can be created.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of obstacle.
        pos - The position to create the new obstacle.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime,
                   float velY)
        Update the obstacle's position relative to the time passed since last frame and the velocity of the boat in that lane.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since last frame.
        velY - The y-velocity of the boat in the same lane as the obstacle.

      • getDamage

        public float getDamage()
        Get the amount of damage the obstacle will deal at a collision.
        Returns:
        A float of the amount of damage.

      • getPos

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPos()
        The position of the obstacle.
        Returns:
        A Vector2 of the position of the obstacle.
